documents.document:
Dark Blood

Darkness pours over the sky,
the feeling of death is making me fly.
I wait until the night is through,
just to see the light in you.
The blood that's pouring out of me,
is drifting in the horrid sea.
My heart is broke because of you,
and now I think what can I do?
I could just sit and die with hate,
but I'll just teach you your own fate.
Look at what you've done to me,
I really hope that you can see.
The pain you've put upon my heart,
is worse than when we were apart.
So now you wait until I die,
to try to make a wretched lie.
You know what you have done to me,
so why do you pour my blood in the sea.

The lord

Traces of my heart,are slowly fading by.
My familys sits and waits,by the bed on which I lye.
The machine begins to slow,as I begin to die.
My family holds their breath, but then I close my eyes.
I hover over them all,as tears fill their eyes.
I looked into the light, but I then had to resist.
I can't just leave my family, abandon them right now.
Not in their time of need, no way,no how.
So I asked the Lord for help, and he takes me in his hands.
"You are my child forever, I hope you understand."
He smiles at me proudly, with love within his eyes.
and I suddenly wake up, my family by my side.
The machine steadies again, as my heart begins to beat.
My family cries beside me as I think of my defeat.
I thanked the Lord above, as my Mother kissed my hands,
and fell asleep with love for him,worth more than life can stand.

Me and You

Your my angel of death,
my moon at night.
My star in the sky,
at midnight.
My heart,
my soul,
my everything.
I want you more than anything.
Nothing will ever come in between,
me and you and all we've seen.
So come and let your heart be true,
and someday I will be with you.

why..

why does this always happen to me..

why do they lie?
why do they cheat
why do i love them
and then end up beat...
why do i hurt so bad inside
why doesnt my heart just let me die.
the knife will never cut as deep as them,
i wish i could just try again.
one more chance to end my life,
one more chance to end the fight.
take my heart and take my soul,
take my life in your control.
take me out of this wretched world,
take me so my heart feels cold.
i trust you now with my last breath,
so now its time to meet my death.

friends

FAKE FRiENDS: Never ask for food.
REAl FRiENDS: are the reason you have no food.

FAKE FRiENDS: Call your parents Mr/Mrs
REAl FRiENDS: Call your parents DAD/MUM

FAKE FRiENDS: bail you out of jail and tell you what you did was wrong.
REAl FRiENDS: Would sit next to you sayin "Damn ... we fucked up ... but that shit was fun!"

FAKE FRiENDS: never seen you cry.
REAl FRiENDS: cry with you

FAKE FRiENDS: Borrow your stuff for a few days then give it back.
REAl FRiENDS: keep your shit so long they forget its yours.

FAKE FRiENDS: know a few things about you.
REAl FRiENDS: Could write a book about you with direct quotes.

FAKE FRiENDS: Will leave you behind if that is what the crowd is doing.
REAl FRiENDS: Will kick the whole crowds ass that left you.

FAKE FRiENDS: Would knock on your front door.
REAl FRiENDS: Walk right in and say "I"M HOME!"

FAKE FRiENDS: Are for a while.
REAl FRiENDS: Are for life.

FAKE FRiENDS: Will take your drink away when they think you"ve had enough.
REAl FRiENDS: Will look at you stumbling all over the place and say "Bitch drink the rest of that you know we don't waste shit."

FAKE FRiENDS: will talk shit to the person who talks shit about you.
REAl FRiENDS: Will knock them the fuck out.

FAKE FRIENDS: Will read this.
REAL FRIENDS: Will steal this

for my friends...

i cut the knife deeper, but the blood was not enough..
i wanted death...i wanted pain..i wanted all to know just what i went through...
i cut deeper again..but it wasnt enough..the pain wasnt there...
i had nothing to show for my soul...
i was inhuman..i was finally invincible...
but i wasnt alive..though i wasnt dead...
i wasnt me...i was gone..
my blood poured and tears fell...
but nothing eased the pain i felt...
nothing could heal my broket heart.

boyfriend application!!

Repost this as "boyfriend application" or "girlfriend application" and see who's eligible to be your special someone. Have fun!
Send it back please if you think you could get "the job"...

BASICS:
Name:
Age:
Location:
Height:
Hair (color and style):
Eyes:
Piercings/tattoos:
will you give me your phone number? _______________________
IM?
OTHER:
1. Do you drink/smoke?
2. Do you like the rain?
4. If so...would you play in it with me?
5. Do you like movies?
6. If so would you stay up and watch them with me all night?
7. Could we cuddle and just fall asleep together?
8. Would you kiss my neck?
9. Do you play any sports?
10. If so...what?
11. Would you call me right after we saw each other?
12. How would you rate your kisses from 1-10?
13. Would you give me what I need?
14. Favorite body part on you?
15. What would you say is the best thing about yourself?
16. Do you have any reps (ie: heartbreaker, ..........)?
17. Would you give me a kiss just because?
18. Would u sleep in the same bed as me?
19. Would u take me home to meet your parents?
20. Would u have sex with me?
21. If so, whats the soonest into our relationship you'd have it?
22. Would you tell your friends we had sex?
23. Would u let me touch u wherever?
24. How smart are you?
25. Do u have a specific body type that u lyk?
26. If so wut is it? (fat, skiny, chubby, athletic,etc)?
27.What would u do if i cried?
28.If i were 2 ask u out what would u say?
29.Would u makeout with me?
30.If we got to the point in the relationship where I told you I loved you, what would you say?
31.Would u ever cheat on me?
32.Would u ever trust me?
33. Would you ever lie to me?
34. Would you be proud to introduce me to your friends?
35. How far would u go with me?

fear~~~please read

this fear i have ive never known,
i saw it with a hate unknown.
i looked into the eyes of death,
but then i had to take a breath.
a voice had come into my head,
and then i heard what it had said.
this isnt worth the pain and hurt,
and all it takes is the first.
the firtst time to try it all,
is when you will start to fall.
you'll go through all the lies and tricks,
and then you'll think its just one fix.
but if you know what good for you,
you'll walk away and make it through.
so look into your heart of hearts,
and you will know it from the start.
this is not the thing to do,
and in your heart you know its true.

by: jrw 2008
